title: Greta Van Susteren Signs Multi-Year Renewal with Newsmax | Newsmax Media, Inc.
snippet: (NYSE:NMAX) ("Newsmax" or the "Company") today announced that veteran news anchor and broadcaster Greta Van Susteren has signed a multi-year extension to host "The Record with Greta Van Susteren."

title: NEWSMAX TV | Live News | Videos - The Record With Greta Van Susteren
snippet: Greta Van Susteren discusses the latest news.

title: Greta Van Susteren Signs Multiyear Renewal With Newsmax | Newsmax.com
snippet: Newsmax announced today that veteran news anchor and broadcaster Greta Van Susteren has signed a multiyear extension to host "The Record With Greta Van Susteren."

title: Greta Van Susteren Signs New Deal With Newsmax

title: Newsmax Shuffles Lineup: Van Susteren, Higbie, Salcedo to Change Time Slots | Newsmax.com
snippet: Newsmax is reshuffling its weekday lineup starting Sept. 8, moving Greta Van Susteren’s “The Record” to 4 p.m. and shifting other shows to strengthen its news cycle coverage and prime-time positioning.
